targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_users")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$Host")
  |> rename(columns:{_value: "n_users"})
  |> keep(columns:["n_users"])
  |> last(column: "n_users")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] ==  "$Host" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * -1.0 + 100.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${Host:pipe}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] =~ /^${CPU:pipe}$/)
  //this aggregatewindow function will unfortunately artificially reduce the max value shown on the chart
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns:["_time","cpu","_value"])

  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "match" or r["_field"] == "state-mismatch" or r["_field"] == "state-insert")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] ==  "$Host" )
  |> drop(columns:["host","_measurement","_start","_stop"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns:{match:"Match","state-insert":"State Insert","state-mismatch":"State Mismatch"})  
  |> last(column: "_time")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "load5" or r["_field"] == "load15")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] ==  "$Host" )  
  |> drop(columns:["host","_measurement","_start","_stop"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","load1","load5","load15"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime_format")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$Host")
  |> rename(columns:{_value: "uptime_format"})
  |> keep(columns:["uptime_format"])
  |> last(column: "uptime_format")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "idle" or r["_field"] == "sleeping" or r["_field"] == "wait" or r["_field"] == "blocked" or r["_field"] == "running" or r["_field"] == "stopped" or r["_field"] == "total" or r["_field"] == "zombies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] ==  "$Host" )
  |> drop(columns:["host","_measurement","_start","_stop"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> last(column: "_time")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] != "devfs" and r["device"] =~ /^${Disk:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["path"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","path","used_percent"])
  |> rename(columns: {"used_percent":"_value"})

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${Host:pipe}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value:"Ram Used"})

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${Host:pipe}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value:"Swap Used"})

//Pfsense < v2.6 had a bug where a a memory leak in pscsd could use all of the laundry space
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${Host:pipe}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "laundry" or r["_field"] == "total")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with laundry_percent:float(v:r.laundry) / float(v:r.total) * float(v: 100) }))
  |> keep(columns:["_time","laundry_percent"])
  |> rename(columns: {laundry_percent:"Laundry Ram Used"})

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "degrees")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${Host:pipe}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] =~ /^${Sensor:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns:["_time","sensor","_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "src_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_port" or r["_field"] == "action" or r["_field"] == "direction" or r["_field"] == "protocolid" or r["_field"] == "host")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^.*$/ and r.action == "block" and r.direction == "in" and r.protocolid =~ /^(6$|17$)/)
  |> group(columns:["src_ip"])
  |> rename(columns:{action: "Blocked"})
  |> count(column: "Blocked")
  
  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table
  |> top(n:10, columns: ["Blocked"])  
  |> sort(columns: ["Blocked"], desc: true)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "src_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_port" or r["_field"] == "action" or r["_field"] == "direction" or r["_field"] == "protocolid" or r["_field"] == "host")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^.*$/ and r.action == "block" and r.direction == "out" and r.protocolid =~ /^(6$|17$)/)
  |> group(columns:["src_ip","dest_ip"])
  |> rename(columns:{action: "Blocked"})
  |> count(column: "Blocked")
  
  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table
  |> top(n:10, columns: ["Blocked"])  
  |> sort(columns: ["Blocked"], desc: true)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "action" or r["_field"] == "direction" or r["_field"] == "host")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^.*$/ and r.action == "block")
  |> group(columns:["direction"])
  |> rename(columns:{action: "Blocked"})
  |> count(column: "Blocked")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${Host}$/)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "in" and r["action"] == "block")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","geoip_code"])
  //give each row a 1 value so that we can use count during the row aggregation
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 1 }))
  |> group(columns: ["geoip_code"])  
  |> window(every: 10m)
  |> count()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","geoip_code","_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_dnsbl_log")
//host is still a tag atm
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^.*$/)
 
|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> group()
|> rename(columns:{duplicateeventstatus:"Blocked Domain Queries"})
|> count(column:"Blocked Domain Queries")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_dnsbl_log")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  //src_ip is currently a tag
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip"])
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^.*$/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","host","src_ip","domain"])
  //counting any column that isnt src_ip
  |> count(column:"domain")  
  |> rename(columns:{domain:"Blocked"})
  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table
  |> top(n:10, columns: ["Blocked"])  
  |> sort(columns: ["Blocked"], desc: true)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_dnsbl_log")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  //tld is currently a tag
  |> group(columns: ["tld"])
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^.*$/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","host","tld","domain"])
  //counting any column that isnt tld
  |> count(column:"domain")  
  |> rename(columns:{domain:"Blocked"})
  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table
  |> top(n:10, columns: ["Blocked"])  
  |> sort(columns: ["Blocked"], desc: true)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "src_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_port" or r["_field"] == "action" or r["_field"] == "direction" or r["_field"] == "protocolid" or r["_field"] == "host")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^.*$/ and r.action == "block" and r.direction == "in" and r.protocolid =~ /^(6$|17$)/)
  |> group(columns:["src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port"])
  |> rename(columns:{action: "Blocked"})
  |> count(column: "Blocked")
  
  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table
  |> top(n:10, columns: ["Blocked"])  
  |> sort(columns: ["Blocked"], desc: true)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "src_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_port" or r["_field"] == "action" or r["_field"] == "direction" or r["_field"] == "protocolid" or r["_field"] == "host")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^.*$/ and r.action == "block" and r.direction == "in" and r.protocolid =~ /^(6$|17$)/)
  |> group(columns:["dest_port"])
  |> rename(columns:{action: "Blocked"})
  |> count(column: "Blocked")
  
  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table
  |> top(n:10, columns: ["Blocked"])  
  |> sort(columns: ["Blocked"], desc: true)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_dnsbl_log")
  |> group(columns:["blocklist","feed_name"])
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "Count"})
  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table
  |> top(n:10, columns: ["Count"])  
  |> sort(columns: ["Count"], desc: true)
  |> yield()

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "src_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_port" or r["_field"] == "action" or r["_field"] == "direction" or r["_field"] == "protocolid" or r["_field"] == "host")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^.*$/ and r.action == "block" and r.direction == "out" and r.protocolid =~ /^(6$|17$)/)
  |> group(columns:["dest_port"])
  |> rename(columns:{action: "Blocked"})

  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table
  |> top(n:10, columns: ["Blocked"])  
  |> sort(columns: ["Blocked"], desc: true)
  |> yield()

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "src_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_port" or r["_field"] == "action" or r["_field"] == "direction" or r["_field"] == "protocolid" or r["_field"] == "host")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

  |> group(columns:["src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port"])

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "src_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_port" or r["_field"] == "action" or r["_field"] == "direction" or r["_field"] == "protocolid" or r["_field"] == "host")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^.*$/ and r.action == "block" and r.direction == "in" and r.protocolid =~ /^(6$|17$)/)
  |> group(columns:["src_ip","dest_ip","protocol"])
  |> rename(columns:{action: "Blocked"})
  |> count(column: "Blocked")
  
  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table
  |> top(n:10, columns: ["Blocked"])  
  |> sort(columns: ["Blocked"], desc: true)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "src_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_port" or r["_field"] == "action" or r["_field"] == "direction" or r["_field"] == "protocolid" or r["_field"] == "host")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^.*$/ and r.action == "block" and r.direction == "in")
  |> group(columns:["protocol"])
  |> rename(columns:{action: "Blocked"})
  |> count(column: "Blocked")
  
  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table
  |> top(n:10, columns: ["Blocked"])  
  |> sort(columns: ["Blocked"], desc: true)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")
  |> group(columns:["feed_name"])
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "Count"})
  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table
  |> top(n:10, columns: ["Count"])  
  |> sort(columns: ["Count"], desc: true)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "src_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_port" or r["_field"] == "action" or r["_field"] == "direction" or r["_field"] == "protocolid" or r["_field"] == "host")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^.*$/ and r.action == "block" and r.direction == "out" and r.protocolid =~ /^(6$|17$)/)
  |> group(columns:["protocol"])
  |> rename(columns:{action: "Blocked"})
  |> count(column: "Blocked")
  
  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table
  |> top(n:10, columns: ["Blocked"])  
  |> sort(columns: ["Blocked"], desc: true)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "src_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_ip" or r["_field"] == "dest_port" or r["_field"] == "action" or r["_field"] == "direction" or r["_field"] == "protocolid" or r["_field"] == "host")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^.*$/ and r.action == "block" and r.direction == "out" and r.protocolid =~ /^(6$|17$)/)
  |> group(columns:["src_ip","dest_ip","protocol"])
  |> rename(columns:{action: "Blocked"})
  |> count(column: "Blocked")
  
  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table
  |> top(n:10, columns: ["Blocked"])  
  |> sort(columns: ["Blocked"], desc: true)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "unbound")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_num_cachemiss" or r["_field"] == "total_num_queries" or r["_field"] == "total_num_cachehits")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] ==  "${Host}" )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_field","_value"])    
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "unbound")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_num_queries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${Host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"], timeColumn: "_time")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_field","_value"])    
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "unbound")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_num_cachemiss" or r["_field"] == "total_num_cachehits")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] ==  "${Host}" )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_field","_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gateways")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "delay")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${Host:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["gateway_name"] =~ /^${Gateway:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns:["_time","gateway_name","_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${Host:regex}$/)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last(column: "_time")
  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table
  //|> keep(columns:["name","friendlyname","ip4_address","mac_address","status","ip6_address"])
  |> rename(columns: {"name":"Interface",friendlyname:"FriendlyName","ip4_address":"IPv4 Address","mac_address":"Physical Address",
  "status":"Status","ip6_address":"IPv6 Address"})

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gateways")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "loss")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${Host:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["gateway_name"] =~ /^${Gateway:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns:["_time","gateway_name","_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gateways")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${Host:regex}$/)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["gateway_name"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last(column: "_time")
  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${Host:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] =~ /^${WAN:regex}$/)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> last(column: "_time")
  |> group()  //use group to ungroup data and return to a single table
  //|> keep(columns:["name","friendlyname","ip4_address","mac_address","status","ip6_address"])
  |> rename(columns: {"name":"Interface",friendlyname:"FriendlyName","ip4_address":"IPv4 Address","mac_address":"Physical Address",
  "status":"Status","ip6_address":"IPv6 Address"})

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${Host:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] =~ /^${WAN:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r)=> r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["interface"])
  |> derivative(columns: ["bytes_recv","bytes_sent"], nonNegative: true, timeColumn: "_time", unit: 1s)
  
  |> keep(columns:["_time","bytes_recv","bytes_sent"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${Host:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] =~ /^${WAN:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["interface"])
  |> derivative(columns: ["bytes_recv","bytes_sent"], nonNegative: true, timeColumn: "_time", unit: 1s)
  |> keep(columns:["_time","interface","bytes_recv","bytes_sent"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${Host:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] =~ /^${WAN:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r)=> r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> difference(columns: ["bytes_recv","bytes_sent"], nonNegative:true,keepFirst:false)
  |> keep(columns:["_time","interface","bytes_recv","bytes_sent"])

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "pfsense",
  tag: "device",
  predicate: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk" and r["host"] =~ /^$Host$/,
  start: -30d
)
list.name: Disk
list.query:

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "pfsense",
  tag: "cpu",
  predicate: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu" and r["host"] =~ /^${Host}$/,
  start: -30d
)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._value != "cpu-total")
list.name: CPU
